list1.title: PARK.ONE is now in beta
contentText: The open beta phase will end at 11:59 on June 24th. During this period, any problems and bugs in the registration, login, and transaction operations，please contact the official customer service ( WeChat: PARKONE-1)  for feedback. And we will greatly appreciate your valuable opinions and suggestions. PARK.ONE will timely optimize processing to bring you a better user experience.
Hope you enjoy your trading on park.one!
